Key Match Events: Bangladesh beat Netherlands by 9 runs on Monday.
Taskin Ahmed picked up 4 wickets for Bangladesh.
Afif Hossain Dhrubo scored 38 runs off 27 balls.
Taskin Ahmed won the Player of the Match award for figures of 4-0-25-4.
Post-Match Reflections: Skipper Shakib Al Hasan wasn't overly happy despite Bangladesh's nine-run win over the Netherlands.
Shakib Al Hasan reckoned that Bangladesh weren't quite up to the mark with the bat in hand.
Shakib Al Hasan mentioned that it was very important to get a win and that they kept losing wickets at regular intervals which wasn't helping them.
Shakib Al Hasan stated that 155 would have been a great total, but they were 10 runs short.
Shakib Al Hasan praised Taskin Ahmed and the pace-bowling contingent, mentioning Taskin's experience and pace.
